ValidationRule.description: If the Action Request field = Order, then the Customer PO#, Vendor PO#, and VOS Sales Order/Invoice# fields are required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Equipment Parts and Service"), ISPICKVAL( EPSAction_Request__c , "Order"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed"), (OR( ISBLANK( VOS_Sales_Order_Invoice__c ), ISBLANK( Customer_PO__c ), ISBLANK( Vendor_PO__c ) )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Action Request = Order, enter the Customer PO#, Vendor PO#, and the VOS Sales Order/Invoice#
